body_html: Thanks Sergio! We did initially try to default to at least SSE4.1 for the PIP builds, but we had reports that this caused problems for some users on older AMD machines, so we now default to the lower spec. This does mean that these installs are missing out on some CPU performance unfortunately, and we're still looking at better solutions around dynamically choosing code paths based on the current architecture. This will be a longer-term project though, unfortunately.

body: Thanks Sergio! We did initially try to default to at least SSE4.1 for the PIP builds, but we had reports that this caused problems for some users on older AMD machines, so we now default to the lower spec. This does mean that these installs are missing out on some CPU performance unfortunately, and we're still looking at better solutions around dynamically choosing code paths based on the current architecture. This will be a longer-term project though, unfortunately.
